content.excerpt_text: ### Refactors * â™»ï¸ Refactor internals, simplify Pydantic v2/v1 utils, `create_model_field`, better types for `lenient_issubclass`. PR [#14860](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14860) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). * â™»ï¸ Simplify internals, remove Pydantic v1 only logic, no longer needed. PR [#14857](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14857) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). * â™»ï¸ Refactor internals, cleanup unneeded Pydantic v1 specific logic....

### Refactors * â™»ï¸ Re-implement `on_event` in FastAPI for compatibility with the next Starlette, while keeping backwards compatibility. PR [#14851](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14851) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). ### Upgrades * â¬†ï¸ Upgrade Starlette supported version range to `starlette>=0.40.0,<1.0.0`. PR [#14853](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14853) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). ### Translations * ğŸŒ Update translations for ru...

### Features * âœ¨ Add support for PEP695 `TypeAliasType`. PR [#13920](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/13920) by [@cstruct](https://github.com/cstruct). * âœ¨ Allow `Response` type hint as dependency annotation. PR [#14794](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14794) by [@jonathan-fulton](https://github.com/jonathan-fulton). ### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix using `Json[list[str]]` type (issue #10997). PR [#14616](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14616) by...

### Features * âœ¨ Add `viewport` meta tag to improve Swagger UI on mobile devices. PR [#14777](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14777) by [@Joab0](https://github.com/Joab0). * ğŸš¸ Improve error message for invalid query parameter type annotations. PR [#14479](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14479) by [@retwish](https://github.com/retwish). ### Fixes * ğŸ› Update `ValidationError` schema to include `input` and `ctx`. PR [#14791](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14791)...

### Breaking Changes * â– Drop support for `pydantic.v1`. PR [#14609](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14609) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). ### Internal * âœ… Run performance tests only on Pydantic v2. PR [#14608](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14608) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo).

### Breaking Changes * ğŸ”Š Add deprecation warnings when using `pydantic.v1`. PR [#14583](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14583) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). ### Translations * ğŸ”§ Add LLM prompt file for Korean, generated from the existing translations. PR [#14546](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14546) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). * ğŸ”§ Add LLM prompt file for Japanese, generated from the existing translations. PR...

### Upgrades * â– Drop support for Pydantic v1, keeping short temporary support for Pydantic v2's `pydantic.v1`. PR [#14575](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14575) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). * The minimum version of Pydantic installed is now `pydantic >=2.7.0`. * The `standard` dependencies now include `pydantic-settings >=2.0.0` and `pydantic-extra-types >=2.0.0`. ### Docs * ğŸ“ Fix duplicated variable in `docs_src/python_types/tutorial005_py39.py`. PR...

### Breaking Changes * ğŸ”§ Drop support for Python 3.8. PR [#14563](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14563) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). * This would actually not be a _breaking_ change as no code would really break. Any Python 3.8 installer would just refuse to install the latest version of FastAPI and would only install 0.124.4. Only marking it as a "breaking change" to make it visible. ### Refactors * â™»ï¸ Upgrade internal syntax to Python 3.9+ ğŸ‰. PR...
### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix parameter aliases. PR [#14371](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14371) by [@YuriiMotov](https://github.com/YuriiMotov).

### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix support for tagged union with discriminator inside of `Annotated` with `Body()`. PR [#14512](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14512) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). ### Refactors * âœ… Add set of tests for request parameters and alias. PR [#14358](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14358) by [@YuriiMotov](https://github.com/YuriiMotov). ### Docs * ğŸ“ Tweak links format. PR [#14505](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14505) by...
### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix support for `if TYPE_CHECKING`, non-evaluated stringified annotations. PR [#14485](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14485) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo).

### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix handling arbitrary types when using `arbitrary_types_allowed=True`. PR [#14482](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14482) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo). ### Docs * ğŸ“ Add variants for code examples in "Advanced User Guide". PR [#14413](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14413) by [@YuriiMotov](https://github.com/YuriiMotov). * ğŸ“ Update tech stack in project generation docs. PR [#14472](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14472) by...

### Features * ğŸš¸ Improve tracebacks by adding endpoint metadata. PR [#14306](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14306) by [@savannahostrowski](https://github.com/savannahostrowski). ### Internal * âœï¸ Fix typo in `scripts/mkdocs_hooks.py`. PR [#14457](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14457) by [@yujiteshima](https://github.com/yujiteshima).

### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix using class (not instance) dependency that has `__call__` method. PR [#14458](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14458) by [@YuriiMotov](https://github.com/YuriiMotov). * ğŸ› Fix `separate_input_output_schemas=False` with `computed_field`. PR [#14453](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14453) by [@YuriiMotov](https://github.com/YuriiMotov).

### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix OAuth2 scopes in OpenAPI in extra corner cases, parent dependency with scopes, sub-dependency security scheme without scopes. PR [#14459](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14459) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo).

### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix OpenAPI security scheme OAuth2 scopes declaration, deduplicate security schemes with different scopes. PR [#14455](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14455) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo).
### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix evaluating stringified annotations in Python 3.10. PR [#11355](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/11355) by [@chaen](https://github.com/chaen).

### Fixes * ğŸ› Fix support for functools wraps and partial combined, for async and regular functions and classes in path operations and dependencies. PR [#14448](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/14448) by [@tiangolo](https://github.com/tiangolo).

### Features * âœ¨ Allow using dependables with `functools.partial()`. PR [#9753](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/9753) by [@lieryan](https://github.com/lieryan). * âœ¨ Add support for wrapped functions (e.g. `@functools.wraps()`) used with forward references. PR [#5077](https://github.com/fastapi/fastapi/pull/5077) by [@lucaswiman](https://github.com/lucaswiman). * âœ¨ Handle wrapped dependencies.
